document_data.name: ''Carpet of Fighting''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''carpet of fighting''''' was a magic item originating in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{Cite dragon/179/Wonders of the Land of Fate}}
document_data.Description: ''Carpets of fighting'' were available in many beautiful or mundane variations.
document_data.Powers:
These rugs acted like ''[[rug of smothering|rugs of smothering]]'' but were activated by a command word spoken by the owner of the rug. Upon speaking the command word, a ''carpet of fighting'' would wrap itself around a target of the owner's choosing, causing the target to fall unconscious within minutes. Targets that did not breathe were not rendered unconscious but simply held by the carpet.

Once wrapped by the carpet, the target could only escape if they possessed immense strength, if the owner's willed it, or if a ''[[hold plant]]'', ''[[animate object]]'', or a ''[[wish]]'' spell was used. Any attacks made upon the carpet while it held its target also damaged the target.
